languages.text: "Несмотря на то, что Леди Теодора даровала дворянский титул дому Версериан, другие дома, служившие в Просторе Коронус не одно тысячелетие, не приняли это решение. Это вызывает определенные трудности в нашей службе".

traits.locale_text: "Несмотря на то, что леди Теодора даровала дворянский титул дому Версериан, другие дома, служившие в Просторе Коронус не одно тысячелетие, не приняли это решение. Это вызывает определенные трудности в нашей службе".

languages.text: "Lady Theodora chose to grant noble status to House Werserian, but the other houses, which have served in the Expanse for millennia, did not welcome the decision. It has led to some difficulties."
languages.original_text: "Несмотря на то, что Леди Теодора даровала дворянский титул дому Версериан, другие дома, служившие в Просторе Коронус не одно тысячелетие, не приняли это решение. Это вызывает определенные трудности в нашей службе".

traits.locale_text: "In spite of Lady Theodora granting the noble status to House Werserian, the other houses, serving the Koronus Expanse for many thousands of years, did not accept this decision. It causes some difficulties during our servitude."

"In spite of Lady Theodora granting the noble status to House Werserian, the other houses, serving the Koronus Expanse for many thousands of years, did not accept this decision. It causes some difficulties during our servitude."
"In spite of Lady Theodora granting the noble status to House Werserian, the other houses, serving the Expanse for millennia, did not endorse this decision. It causes some rift in our service."
"In spite of Lady Theodora granting the noble status to House Werserian, the other houses, serving the Expanse for millennia, did not endorse this decision. It causes some rift in our service."
"Lady Theodora chose to grant noble status to House Werserian, but the other houses, which have served in the Expanse for millennia, did not welcome the decision. It has led to some difficulties."
"Lady Theodora chose to grant noble status to House Werserian, but the other houses, which have served in the Expanse for millennia, did not welcome the decision. It has led to some difficulties."

languages.text: 「レディ・シオドーラがウェルザリアン家に貴族の地位を与えてくださったにもかかわらず、エクスパンスに何百年と仕えている他家は、この決定を支持しませんでした。それにより、少々問題が発生しました」
languages.original_text: "Lady Theodora chose to grant noble status to House Werserian, but the other houses, which have served in the Expanse for millennia, did not welcome the decision. It has led to some difficulties."

traits.locale_text: 「レディ・シオドーラがウェルザリアン家に貴族の地位を与えてくださったにもかかわらず、エクスパンスに何百年と仕えている他家は、この決定を支持しませんでした。それで私たち貴族家は不仲なのです」

languages.text: “尽管西奥多拉夫人授予韦尔森家族贵族之位，但其他在科罗努斯扩区扎根数千年的名门望族并不赞同这样的决定，这也给我们的合作造成了障碍。”
languages.original_text: "Lady Theodora chose to grant noble status to House Werserian, but the other houses, which have served in the Expanse for millennia, did not welcome the decision. It has led to some difficulties."

traits.locale_text: “尽管西奥多拉夫人授予韦尔森家族贵族之位，但其他在科罗努斯扩区扎根数千年的名门望族并不赞同这样的决定，这也给我们的合作造成了裂痕。”

languages.text: « Les autres maisons, qui étaient au service des Étendues depuis des millénaires, n'ont pas particulièrement apprécié que dame Théodora anoblisse la maison Werserian. Cela nous a souvent porté préjudice. »
languages.original_text: "Lady Theodora chose to grant noble status to House Werserian, but the other houses, which have served in the Expanse for millennia, did not welcome the decision. It has led to some difficulties."

traits.locale_text: « Les autres maisons, qui étaient au service des Étendues depuis des millénaires, n'ont pas particulièrement apprécié que dame Théodora anoblisse la maison Werserian. Cela nous a souvent porté préjudice. »

languages.text: «A pesar de que Lady Theodora concedió el título nobiliario a la casa Werserian, las demás casas, que llevaban miles de años sirviendo a la Extensión, no apoyaron esa decisión. Esto ha causado algunos problemas».
languages.original_text: "Lady Theodora chose to grant noble status to House Werserian, but the other houses, which have served in the Expanse for millennia, did not welcome the decision. It has led to some difficulties."

traits.locale_text: «A pesar de que Lady Theodora concedió el título nobiliario a la casa Werserian, las demás casas, que llevaban miles de años sirviendo a la Extensión, no apoyaron esa decisión. Esto causa desavenencias en nuestro servicio».

languages.text: "Als Lady Theodora die Familie Werserian in den Stand eines Adelshauses erhoben hat, haben das die anderen Häuser — die der Ausdehnung seit Jahrtausenden dienen — nicht gutgeheißen. Das hat zu Spannungen geführt."
languages.original_text: "Lady Theodora chose to grant noble status to House Werserian, but the other houses, which have served in the Expanse for millennia, did not welcome the decision. It has led to some difficulties."

traits.locale_text: "Als Lady Theodora die Familie Werserian in den Stand eines Adelshauses erhoben hat, haben das die anderen Häuser — die der Ausdehnung seit Jahrtausenden dienen — nicht gutgeheißen. Das sorgt für einige Spannungen."

languages.text: "Werserian Hanesi'ne soylu statüsünü bahşeden Leydi Theodora'ydı. Fakat Enginlik'te binlerce yıldır hizmet etmiş diğer haneler bu karardan hoşnut olmadı. Bu da bazı zorluklara yol açtı."
languages.original_text: "Lady Theodora chose to grant noble status to House Werserian, but the other houses, which have served in the Expanse for millennia, did not welcome the decision. It has led to some difficulties."

traits.locale_text: "Werserian Hanesi'ne soylu statüsünü bahşeden Leydi Theodora'ydı. Fakat Enginlik'te binlerce yıldır hizmet etmiş diğer haneler bu karardan hoşnut olmadı. Bu da bazı zorluklara yol açtı."
